aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: I am a Front-end developer based in Walldorf, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
aboutMe.contactMe: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!
aboutMe.informationOne: With years of experience as an IT system administrator and a deep fascination for the world of IT, I bring both expertise and passion to every project.
aboutMe.informationTwo: As a front-end web developer, I want to create new things and realize innovative projects. With a focus on design and usability, I strive to develop engaging and intuitive web applications that delight users.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This page is a sample of my work! Scroll down to view other projects I have developed.
portfolio.el_pollo_loco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.pokedex: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.contactText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contribution to your projects with my work.
contact.privacyPartTwo: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
